swen221.lab2.model

类 Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • swen221.lab2.model.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements an abstract version of Conway's game of life where the rules for birth's and deaths are customisable. The simulation operators over a given board using a given set of rules. The simulation "executes" the game one step at a time.
    作者:
    David J. Pearce

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Simulation(Board board, Rule... rules)
      Construct game simulation using a given board and rule set.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Take a single step of the simulation.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Simulation

        public Simulation(Board board,
                  Rule... rules)
        Construct game simulation using a given board and rule set.
        参数:
        board - The starting board to use
        rules - The set of rules which are applied in the order given

    • 方法详细资料

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()

      • step

        public void step()
        Take a single step of the simulation. This is done by walking through each cell and calculating its new state by applying the rules in their order until either one applies and yields a new state, or not apply (hence, the original state is retained).

      • step

        public void step(int n)
        Take N steps through the simulation. This is done by performing N single steps.
        参数:
        n - The number of steps to take
